entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
